inclusion.criterion: Pulmonary TB suspects as defined by a cough for more than 2 weeks
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Producing pure blood sputum or clear saliva
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Receiving anti TB treatment (isoniazid, rifampicin, streptomycin, pyrazinamide
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has been admitted to the hospital after 10 days of cough and has a positive sputum culture for Mycobacterium tuberculosis.
